_aChangeLog.text: Disabled map voting during warmup; Removed the second warmup round
Fixed issue with the NPC-s movement logic, where they would stop moving
Added glow to outdoor lights and spacedome. Improved 2 areas of the Catacombs
Adjusted certain holds durations and NPC health across stages to balance gameplay
Increased elevator clipping on Cabin Woods stage to prevent knifing through
Fixed the kill trigger at the cabin area to target randomly (best) and reduced global hurt
Rotated the lava-room so players don't telehop into the lava. Added shortcuts for zombies
Fix a spot on last stage where the zombie pushes were canceling out after the concert
Removed the moving NPC segment from the last stage, which was ~1min of boring gameplay
[Required] Filter the last 2 CT teleports to humans
[Recommended] Scale down the orb NPC dmg/health on the last stage
Other improvements documented in the stripper

_aLatestUpdates._sText: Attaching stripper with 2 bug fixes and other recommended improvements

_sText:
Archiving the final version

This map contains 6 stages, based on various movies/games (see screenshots)
A perfect run would take 60-65 min

Good luck

-------------------
Thanks to the Nide community for helping with mapping and GFL/Unloze for testing
